name: Hotel Management System
desc: A hotel management project is a comprehensive initiative in the hospitality industry that focuses on creating and implementing an efficient system to oversee all aspects of hotel operations..

name: Student Management System
desc: A Student data management project focuses on developing a system to collect, store, and manage student data efficiently in educational institutions.

name: Airlines Analytics
desc: The Airlines Data Analysis project involves extracting insights and valuable information from airline-related datasets using SQL and Python.

name: Tomato leaf diseases
desc: This project tackles tomato leaf diseases! We're building a tool to identify problems early. By taking a picture, the system analyzes the leaf for signs of disease.

name: Chatbot
desc: Chatbot project: create a program for chatting like a virtual assistant. It can answer questions, complete tasks, or guide users.  Think of it as a conversational website or app!
